Almost 15+ companies have come for placements and i didn't even get a chance to write a single OA..  
I have a cgpa of 7.4.. I had applied for some companies with 7 cutoff but still didn't get shortlisted for any OA.

comments.body: Cfbr

You will have to either wait it out until students with higher GPA get placed. With that CGPA, its going to be challenging to get through to the interview round as well, regardless of how well your OA goes. This is why I keep telling everyone to keep working on their CGPA. Anyway, you cannot do anything about it apart from upskilling so that when you do make it to the interviews, you are a strong candidate. For now, keep applying off campus and don't lose hope. Its going to be a tough ride for you.
